p.e:
Units and buildings are made 
in production buildings.
For a building to produce 
something, it must have access
to enough resources to pay for
that thing.
To get resources into the building,
move them there using units which
can carry them, or by other
special abilities.
Gold can be mined when a miner
'attacks' the deposit, or a mining
building is on it.
Oil is collected by oil drills or
equivalent.

Units and vehicles can move on the
same turn that they are produced,
unless their card states otherwise.
Buildings can produce 1 thing per
turn, unless their card states
otherwise
